page.title: 17Rhenigidale Language/Health
page.content: In the Western Isles the primary language is Gaelic, with English as a second language. Nearly everyone in the village of Rhenigidale speaks both languages. Some of the houses have Gaelic names e.g {Tigh na Mara}_ house by the sea and{ Sith Phort}_ peace haven. Other gaelic words include{ {ceilidh}_ a visit, informal gathering. {Dun _ Eideann}_Edinburgh, and{beinn} _mountain/hill.{ { {Health }The nearest medical help is Tarbert. If necessary the doctor can arrive quickly by boat. However the weather can be unsuitable in an emergency and in these circumstances, as happened a few years ago, a helicopter has to be used. It is comforting to know that this facility is available should weather and circumstances make it necessary.
